questions.text: A 70-year-old male was suffering from motion sickness. He came to the physician because he has to travel the next day to a hilly station. The physician asked him to take a hyoscine to control his symptoms. Hyoscine is a weak base. Which of the following site does the hyoscine get absorbed?
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Small intestine

Highyeild:

Basic drugs in an alkaline medium get unionized and get absorbed faster. So basic drugs like morphine, hyoscine, and atropine get unionized in the small intestine and get absorbed Acidic drugs get unionized in an acidic medium and get absorbed from the stomach

questions.text: A patient was prescribed a drug with a pKa of 5 and the drug reaches the medium with a pH of 5. Which of the following is TRUE?
questions.explanation:
Solution:

50% ionized and 50% un-ionized

Highyeild:

The pH of the medium is equal to pKa (the difference is zero), then the drug is 50% ionized and 50% un-ionized
